messages.warning_not_safe_to_move: Please stop and apply the parking brake!

moveToPassengerSeat.title: Move to Passenger Seat
moveToPassengerSeat.desc: Moves the camera to the passenger seat.

moveToDriverSeat.title: Move to Driver Seat
moveToDriverSeat.desc: Moves the camera to the driver's seat.

moveToStandingPosition.title: Move to Standing Position | Walk Forward
moveToStandingPosition.desc: Moves the camera to a standing position in the cabin. When standing, used for walking.

cycleSofaPositions.title: Move to Sofa | Cycle Sofa Positions
cycleSofaPositions.desc: Moves the camera to the sofa. When on the sofa, cycles through positions (sitting, lying down).

warning_duration_ms.title: Warning Duration
warning_duration_ms.desc: How long the 'not safe to move' warning is displayed.

cabin_layout.title: Cabin Layout
cabin_layout.desc: Set the steering wheel side for correct animations.

height.title: Height
height.desc: How high the camera rises in animations (simulates human height).

enabled.desc: Enable or disable this camera position.

sofa_sit1.title: Sofa (Sit) Main position on the sofa

driver_to_passenger.title: Driver -> Passenger
driver_to_passenger.desc: Duration of the animation from the driver's seat to the passenger's seat.

passenger_to_driver.title: Passenger -> Driver
passenger_to_driver.desc: Duration of the animation from the passenger's seat to the driver's seat.

driver_to_standing.title: Driver -> Standing
driver_to_standing.desc: Duration of the animation from the driver's seat to the standing position.

standing_to_driver.title: Standing -> Driver
standing_to_driver.desc: Duration of the animation from the standing position to the driver's seat.

passenger_to_standing.title: Passenger -> Standing
passenger_to_standing.desc: Duration of the animation from the passenger's seat to the standing position.

standing_to_passenger.title: Standing -> Passenger
standing_to_passenger.desc: Duration of the animation from the standing position to the passenger's seat.

standing_to_sofa.title: Standing -> Sofa
standing_to_sofa.desc: Duration of the animation from the standing position to the sofa.

sofa_to_standing.title: Sofa -> Standing
sofa_to_standing.desc: Duration of the animation from the sofa to the standing position.

sofa_sit1_to_lie.title: Sofa (Sit 1) -> Lie Down
sofa_sit1_to_lie.desc: Duration of the animation from the first sitting position to the lying position on the sofa.

sofa_lie_to_sit2.title: Sofa (Lie) -> Sit 2
sofa_lie_to_sit2.desc: Duration of the animation from the lying position to the second sitting position on the sofa.

sofa_sit2_to_sit1.title: Sofa (Sit 2) -> Sit 1
sofa_sit2_to_sit1.desc: Duration of the animation from the second sitting position to the first sitting position on the sofa.

sofa_lie_to_sit1_shortcut.title: Sofa (Lie) -> Sit 1 (Shortcut)
sofa_lie_to_sit1_shortcut.desc: Duration of the animation from the lying position to the first sitting position.

crouch.title: Crouch Transition
crouch.desc: Duration of the animation when crouching or standing up.

tiptoe.title: Tiptoe Transition
tiptoe.desc: Duration of the animation when going on tiptoes or returning to a normal stance.

walk_step.title: Walk: Step Duration
walk_step.desc: Duration of a single walking step.

walk_first_step_base.title: Walk: First Step Base Duration
walk_first_step_base.desc: Base duration of the first step when starting to walk.

walk_first_step_turn_extra.title: Walk: First Step Turn Extra Duration
walk_first_step_turn_extra.desc: Additional time added to the first step when turning while walking.

step_amount.title: Step Amount
step_amount.desc: How far each step moves the camera forward/backward.

bob_amount.title: Bob Amount
bob_amount.desc: The amount of camera shake up/down when walking.

walk_zone_z.title: Walking Zone
walk_zone_z.desc: Defines the forward/backward movement limits relative to the cabin center.

hold_time_ms.title: Trigger Hold Time
hold_time_ms.desc: How long you need to look up/down to change stance.

activation_angle.desc: The camera pitch angle required to activate the stance.

deactivation_angle.desc: The camera pitch angle required to return to a neutral stance.

depth.title: Crouch Depth
depth.desc: How low the camera goes when crouching.

height.title: Tiptoe Height
height.desc: How high the camera goes when on tiptoes.
